website_summaries.verdict: Easily the best choice for your money – it divides a room at a fraction of the price of similar models with little difference in quality.
pros: This 4-panel stand-up divider is the perfect combination of good looks and practical use – ideal for dividing a room for guests, or to simply add an attractive accent along with a bit of privacy
cons: Not as private as curtain models – gaps in between panels
A bit flimsy and could potentially be knocked over with minimal force

customer_reviews.title: Easy, stylish way to separate your room
customer_reviews.text: These things are actually very cool. I bought two of them to separate my living room in two when guests stay with me. There are tiny gaps in between the frames but they absolutely work well enough to provide a sense of privacy. Quality is good, they look very nice and fold up very easily. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cy K.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: My apartment has almost no storage, just two small bedroom closets. It was depressing to wake up and see my vacuum cleaner and exercise machine every morning but there was no where else to put them. I bought this screen to hide them. Now I wake up to a beautiful room every morning! The frame and hinges are very good quality, sturdy and stand up to every day use. I pull out the exercise machine every morning and put it back as well as the vacuum cleaner. It's changed the entire look of my room as you can see with the before and after pictures.
customer_reviews.author: L.L.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: It looks quite polished and simple and it makes for a super great room divider. I'm attaching a photo to show how I put it up. I otherwise have a studio that's just plain, but this gives me a living room area and my bed behind it. You'll see!
customer_reviews.author: Axxxgill

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, nice black panels.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice furniture item. They look exactly the same as advertised in the picture and the quality is definitely outstanding. I used them to separate the bed area in a studio apartment where I am currently living. I am definitely satisfied with the results. See attached picture.
customer_reviews.author: Francis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! I bought one with 10 for my living room and one with 4 for my kitchen!!
customer_reviews.author: miria gittens

customer_reviews.title: Converting Home to Office
customer_reviews.text: With everything going on in the world, many people like myself are having to work from home. I purchased the room divider to act as a background screen for my online work. I was able to convert a small workspace in a bedroom to a mini office. Package arrived fully assembled with absolutely no damage. Lightweight, sturdy enough. I sit the panel on thick carpet but if I had hardwood floors, I'd look for the stand to go with the screen.
customer_reviews.author: PsychatTheGray

customer_reviews.title: Damaged package and box - not what we're looking for
customer_reviews.text: Box had a large gouge in the side (I believe this particular item has been shipped out and returned several times, as there was evidence of the box being taped up multiple times), and the item itself was broken in 3 places - 3 different areas of the window pane separators. If it was intact, it would be very nice as a room divider, but doesn't work for what we needed it for in the office - there is no privacy given as there's a rather large gap between each panel due to the hinges.
customer_reviews.author: Linda W.

customer_reviews.title: Thin paper panels broke first day when unit toppled over due to bad manufacturing.
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy. Panels are screwed together loosely. Wobbly. Thin paper panels broke first day when unit toppled over due to bad manufacturing.

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended to buy
customer_reviews.text: Product came broken. No way to return/replace. After you open the big package, it is extremely hard, as a customer, to repack it. One of the frames was already broken. Very shocked to see that the missing/broken piece is not inside the package, this means, a broken piece was sent by the seller, it did not break after it was packed. Screen Material is paper, opaque enough but if you or your kid happen to spill somewater on it, the whole screen would collapse. Poor design and material.
customer_reviews.author: Safath

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit hesitant about this purchase but I'm definitely pleased with it. Was able to use it straight from the box,no assembly required. Definitely added a classy touch and bed room privacy to my studio apt
customer_reviews.author: Tequana Cox

customer_reviews.title: beyond love it
customer_reviews.text: i wasn't sure what size to buy, and was very leery that the paper and frame would be flimsy. IT IS ANYTHING BUT FLIMSY. it's sturdy so you don't need to buy feet for it to remain upright, but like anything if you hit it, it will fall over. the paper is not so thin you can see through it easily or that it will tear if you accidentally touch it but be careful not to poke the paper hard. honestly i'm very very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: A. R. West

customer_reviews.title: I'm disappointed to have to be returning it so soon
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to receive this divider in the mail as it was a reasonable price and had very high reviews. However when it arrived, there were two tears in the paper material straight out of the box. I'm disappointed to have to be returning it so soon.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsie O

customer_reviews.title: It looks wonderful, it holds up well on its own
customer_reviews.text: I needed a privacy screen for our living room to divide the sofa bed from the rest of the room when family or guests stay over. When I read some of the negative reviews I was worried about the quality of the wood or it arriving damaged. But I was pleasantly surprised by the sturdiness of this room divider. It looks wonderful, it holds up well on its own, and it is easy to store and put away. I may start using it in my photography. I'm very happy with this purchase and would buy again if I find the need for a second one in my home.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Better than described
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item to use as a background for video conference calls while working in my unfinished basement during COVID-19. This screen is better than described and better than I expected. The screen has dual hinges so I can fold the panels forwards and backwards to create whatever shapes I need for the moment. I will order a second set for our travel trailer so people can have privacy when camping with us. Outstanding purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Trout

customer_reviews.title: so easily broken
customer_reviews.text: cheap and flimsy. if you plan on having a screen that needs to be moved often (like opening a door) then this is NOT the one. the little sticks break very very easily. find a metal or plastic screen.
customer_reviews.author: kawaiisprinkle

customer_reviews.title: Great Divider - Worth the $
customer_reviews.text: While I'm lucky to have a drywall between my living and bedroom space in my studio apartment, I don't have any doors/walls to separate my "bedroom" from the kitchen area. With guests staying over, I needed an easy fix and this was the solution. This 4-panel divider came well packaged and was super light to stand up and move. The screens are a little thin and while it doesn't block light, it does provide complete privacy. Just make sure you bend it enough because if almost straight , it'll topple over. It's long enough that it almost blocks off my full-sized bed (in length). This was definitely worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda M.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy + elegant look
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased that I selected this 4 panel screen. It is designed extremely well, easy to position, and it looks absolutely amazing. When I pulled this out of box it was more than I ever imagined. The price is very good for such a well designed product. Packaging was excellent/easy to open and no damage to the screen
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and simple
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2, only received 1, but was able to contact support and get the 2nd about a week later. Fairly sturdy (I mean, the panels themselves are rice paper, I don't know how sturdy you can really get with that's, but the wood part is nice). The hinges on one section in the main one (that we use to block off part of a room for our pet rabbit) are a little stiff so it can be a pain to maneuver. Another hinge squeaks. Perfectly fine if you don't plan on constantly adjusting it. Very light weight. Easy to just pick up and move.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Came in very handy
customer_reviews.text: I had a guest coming and my spare room is occupied by my son. So the guest had to be in the family room (with no door). I bought this screen to afford her some semblance of privacy. It is perfect for that purpose. The cats still got in there, but she's a cat person, so she didn't mind. The dog did not. Because the screen folds, I just store it inside the entrance to the family room and can be sure it won't be knocked over accidentally. It's inexpensively made, but I certainly got more than my money's worth. And it looks nice, too.
customer_reviews.author: CWC

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Great item love it a lot. But.. The box came heavily damaged and some of the white fabric was not torn but indented like something heavy was sitting on it. If the Styrofoam inside the box was more heavy duty on the front and back it would have prevented it. Two of the black slats looked like they broke before shipping and they glued it together. Not too big of a deal put it at the bottom just not what I expected. Over all decent product.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Burnett

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the price. I need something to hide some shelves that can be easily moved away when I want to use the shelves. Lightweight, stands up on its own no problem, and is over 6 feet tall. Took off one star because the gaps between the panels are pretty wide, and you can see through them more than I would like. The gaps are so large because the hinges are flimsy. But it is half the price of every other screen I looked at, so that is a good trade. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Analog2000

customer_reviews.title: It's translucent---not opaque as indicated
customer_reviews.text: The overall quality is ok. The frame its plastic. But--importantly, the description indicates that the screen is "opaque" It's not--rather, it is translucent. I do think the product description needs to be changed. I purchased this, in large part, as to block out early morning sun in a bedroom. It will not do that. Nevertheless, I will use it in another application rather than return it.
customer_reviews.author: A Reader III

customer_reviews.title: Nice little screen
customer_reviews.text: Bought to create privacy in an office with large windows. It is perfect for that purpose- it's thick enough to provide a visual barrier but thin enough to allow light through. The white and black scheme give a minimalist look which is elegant but not distracting, and goes very well with plants. I will say that it is quite flimsy (the frame is thin particle board and the screen feels like tissue paper)- but, at this price point, I didn't expect something to pass down for generations.
customer_reviews.author: PCW

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but surprisingly wobbly.
customer_reviews.text: not bad but knocking one star off for the overall wobbly feel of the construction. The hinges don't seem well-aligned or sturdy enough for the weight of the overall frame so it rattles worryingly when adjusted. Gaps between the panels are large enough that it's a bit iffy to be used as a real modesty screen from some angles. (Approx half-inch wide gaps when extended.) But overall gets the job done and certainly looks classy (from the patterned side anyway). Free delivery was excellent because this thing IS bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Mei

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my home decor!!  It is stylish and beautiful yet functions in many capacities.
customer_reviews.text: Item came packaged securely and arrived well before it's estimated date of arrival. I have used this item for several different things in my home at different times. I use it to block the front door when we have guests so my dog won't bolt out the door. I use it in the master bedroom as privacy for dressing in front of the walk in. It is also used in the guest room when autistic grandson comes to visit as it seems to be a comfort for him having it up by the window when he sleeps.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Good screen!
customer_reviews.text: I use them to block our doorways to keep the cat out while maintaining air circulation. I either put weights against the bottom or wedge the ends into angles so the cat can't pull or push them open. So far he hasn't damaged them. I do move them around and they've been surprisingly steady and sturdy. I've recommended them to many family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Emntnmama

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded Expectations
customer_reviews.text: Much better than expected! I was worried about in route damage, and though the boxes were beat up, the screens were in great shape. Would have loved it if the hinges had been black or at least antiqued instead of the bright bronze. Nice framing and heavy paper screen material. We've used these a couple of different ways. Bought 2 sets, very nice to have.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Video conference backdrop
customer_reviews.text: I work from home and was getting fed up with showing my colleagues my kitchen. I got the 4-panel version and it is just right to form a curve behind me and fill the field of view completely. As mentioned, the hinges have some looseness, probably to allow for uneven floors. It's light, so putting away nearby every day isn't a big chore. Although it's not incredibly sturdy, it isn't so fragile that I'm worried I'll damage it if I'm moderately careful.
customer_reviews.author: Rahmi Eliati

customer_reviews.title: Virutec Computer Repair Approved.
customer_reviews.text: I run a small computer repair store and only leave reviews on the things I feel meet expectations. I am giving this item a 5 star because It works great with no problems. We probably spend over $50,000 a year on Amazon for our business, so finding the right parts in a timely matter at an affordable price so I can make some profit is key. We rely on Amazon to keep us in stock with parts.
customer_reviews.author: Virutec Computer Repair

customer_reviews.title: Moveable Meditation tool
customer_reviews.text: Renovating a closet...Used this attractive Shoji to cover construction area until our carpenter completes the new foyer closet. It creates a peaceful feeling when you come in the door...makes you want to stop and meditate right where you are...OMMMMM...Will re-position it when closet complete. Perfect for hiding stuff ...perfect for headboard...perfect for moving around your home for multiple affects...
customer_reviews.author: booth malloy

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, but not perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Does what it should, but only wish would be for it to be a little more bottom heavy so that it is less likely to tip over if bumped into. It's so light that it can fall over pretty easily with just a small bump. or maybe have a slightly thicker base for stability. Otherwise, attractive, simple, and serves it's purpose well.
customer_reviews.author: DLEE

customer_reviews.title: Great for studio apartments.
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for creating a privacy wall between my queen sized bed and the front door of my very small studio apt, just in case someone is still in the bed while I'm going in and out. It also makes the bed feel a bit cozier and almost has the feeling of creating another room, albeit large enough only for a bed. It's exactly long enough, while folded enough to stand up, to stretch from end to end at the foot of the bed.
customer_reviews.author: JDH

customer_reviews.title: You will need to DIY if you want this screen to provide privacy
customer_reviews.text: As other reviews indicate, there are substantial spaces in the screen you can see through which mean it doesn't provide privacy. I "fixed" the issue by purchasing black felt and attaching it to the screen. This is a good screen for many uses, but you will need to hack it if you are seeking privacy.
customer_reviews.author: Asher L. Stuhlman

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I use two of these as a room divider, and it provides a measure of privacy. Not a 100%, as there are small gaps between the panels, but they aren't that wide. I move these frequently while cleaning the room and they're light enough to do that very easily. They're not very sturdy though, but if you leave them completely undisturbed they will stay standing up.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Great screen!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these screens to use in the living room when my daughter and family stay overnight and need to sleep on the couches. It works very well to give them more privacy. The screens look modern, and I like that they can let some light in through the white part. They are lightweight and stand up very well in different configurations without tipping.
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie Sue

customer_reviews.title: Exactly As I Expected
customer_reviews.text: I got this to give some privacy when needed in a large room. We've used it several times, and it's performed as expected. You can't see through it, except the cracks where the hinges are. It doesn't look cheaply made, but it needs to be handled carefully, as it looks like it could get rips or break if manhandled. It's a nice quality partition that gives enough privacy while looking classy.
customer_reviews.author: MZ

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Room Accent.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the four panel screen to see how it would accent against the windows and of the marble floor of our den ( uneven. white marble slabs set in charcoal grey concrete). The black wood framed white panels fit right in! I was pleasantly surprised that the white sections were made of a sturdy material resembling fibers of an air conditioner filter--in that you cannot poke your finger through as if it were of rice paper. I bought a second four panel screen to sit along its mate in front of the den window. It lets light through and is not opaque.
customer_reviews.author: J.C.Shopper

customer_reviews.title: A little warped
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2. One of them is kind of warped. It still works and we aren't going to go through the trouble of returning it, but if you're looking to have these on permanent display, you might want to proceed cautiously. We're using them as a privacy screen when guests are here so we don't worry too much about what they look like.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Easy to move around screen
customer_reviews.text: I use this screen when I conduct video conferences and audio webinars. It provides a wall for the sound so my voice is more audible. It's very lightweight and easy to maneuver, so that's a great feature. I don't use it as a decorative piece, but it's attractive and would give you a nice wall where needed in a room that requires a private nook.
customer_reviews.author: Red Ryder

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous, stylish and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and sturdy. No assembly required and arrived in perfect condition due to the excellent packaging and reinforcement. I’m using these to conceal litter box stations as we foster cats and kittens for our county shelter. It’s nice to have the areas contained every day and concealed during meet n greets. I also love how stylish these are and how they are truly made for privacy. I bought two. I want more. They are gorgeous!
customer_reviews.author: SweetPea66

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and no privacy! So why buybit?
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing screens. Provide NO privacy as the gap between panels is huge. Very lightweight and flimsy. Should have been more careful in buying these.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it but it smells weird!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this! It comes in so handy for client photos! But, when I first received it it had a strong chemical odor! I can’t really describe it, it’s just strong. It’s going away but it’s been a month. One Year update! The smell was gone in about 1 month! And, I love it! I still use it in my makeup videos!
customer_reviews.author: Sasha Rae

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, but does the job.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these and they arrived today. Shipping was reasonably quick. Well, all I can say is they do the job and provide privacy when I open the door wide open for fresh air to come in. But, I must say, the quality of these dividers screams C-H-E-A-P!!! My goodness, I’m surprised I can’t get these at WalMart for $19.95 which is the price point I would deem as fair for this product. I suppose there’s a more diplomatic way of describing a cheaply made product, but I am rating these for the privacy they provide, and it does that well. So for that much, I’m happy. I’d be ecstatic if they sold for $20-30 less.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Panda

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I like the design. I use it to block the tower I keep my appliances on. It also serves as a divider while doing this. Be careful how you move it because it's not heavy enough to be considered sturdy. It may fall over. But that's also good because if it does fall over no one will get hurt. The detailing could be better--it cracked when I tried to move it but since the piece didnr come off you cant actually see the cracked part.
customer_reviews.author: Karanyc

customer_reviews.title: A Perfect Solution
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I do online teaching and needed to make a temporary "classroom". I love it! It is light weight so I can easily set it up and take it down each day. I even decorate it. When I need to take online workshops I always get compliments from other teachers or workshop hosts that they like my background. It came directly from the manufacturer and was very well packaged. No damage from shipping whatsoever. There is also nothing to put together, just unpack and use. Highly recommended..
customer_reviews.author: paula daubert

customer_reviews.title: Very Strong Smell of Chemicals
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two items in order to separate my desk from the rest of the room. In the beginning, I was very happy with the stability until I notice a very strong chemical smell in the room. I had to remove them to the balcony. Do you have any recommendation for this strong smell ? Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: David Andreis

customer_reviews.title: Classy room divider
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking forward. It helps block off certain sections of my house. It is very easy to carry around yet sturdy enough to stay upright on carpet. The screen looks just as pictured and arrived fully assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It falls down often. Does not stand well.
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to make a separate bed space from the living room. It can stand when you have sharp angle of the panels. Bigger than 120 degrees maybe not a good way of using it since it may fall down, especially if it is on a carpet. I recommend you to think again about the total length when it has smaller than 120 degrees if you want it to stand alone.
customer_reviews.author: Sang Gyu Lee

customer_reviews.title: This is truly a great buy
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this for my office. And now it’s in my home. It’s light weight yet very durable. No rips so far and I’ve had it for close to 6 months. Really beautiful and well made, easily worth triple the cost at a local store. It’s also very easy to move and fold into various areas. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Great for blocking sun, creating a background
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - great for blocking sun in front of vertical blinds - looks great from across the room - nice background for home photography studio - arrives fast and in great condition and it's pre-built - stands up very well - easily moved to other parts of the house/room - folds up flat for easy storage when not in use Cons: - they don't sand the edges of all the grid slats (choppy sides painted black show up close up) - not okay for dressing/undressing behind as you can see between panels - only one side has grid
customer_reviews.author: princesscoldheart

customer_reviews.title: Featherweight Beauty
customer_reviews.text: I just got it today. This screen is lightweight and beautiful. I am going to use it to hide a box with the artificial Christmas tree in a corner of my guest bedroom. The company packed it well. I will never see seventy again and I had no trouble removing it from its box or carrying it into the house.
customer_reviews.author: Fast Served

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, nice looking.
customer_reviews.text: Received mine last week. It looks very nice and arrived in good condition. This is light enough that it is easy to move around but still feels like a quality construction. I am not sure how traditional shoji screens are, but the backing is not really paper. It is more of a thin foamy-plastic. I like it, because it looks the same but is slightly more resistant to tearing. I do wish the crossing bars were on both sides instead of just one.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I needed something modular that I can use in my space at different times of day, I got this as an "open box" item for much else and it arrived in excellent condition and is probably one of my best amazon purchases. Extremely useful and lightweight, gorgeous, love it! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Aurora M

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice product for the money. My only complaint is that the detailing across the screen is only on one side, the other side is blank and rather ugly to look at because of that. Otherwise I like it! It is lightweight, easy to position, and has held up really well even with a two year old in the house!
customer_reviews.author: Joelle

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: They worked as expected. provides good privacy . The only draw back is i would get the stand for these in order to maintain the sturdiness of the over all product. With out it it will fall over easy.
customer_reviews.author: swbrown69

customer_reviews.title: Unstable on carpet
customer_reviews.text: This won't stand on carpet, i had to lean one side of the panel against the wall to keep it from falling.
customer_reviews.author: oldCricket

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Broken and damaged
customer_reviews.text: My 1st Order arrived damaged, package and product. And when my replacement order arrived it was also damaged. Very disappointing bc the material is better than Shōji paper. Also Difficult to get replacement for the replacement.
customer_reviews.author: mark williams

customer_reviews.title: Nice Divider
customer_reviews.text: I had looked at this item before and considered it, but wasn't sure if it would look as good in person or be too flimsy. Got it for an amazing cyber-Monday price that made it well worth taking a chance. Very glad I did. It's a lovely piece - light weight, but sturdy enough that it isn't falling over and each panel is hinged both directions, so that's awesome. I know one question I had was whether the grid was on both sides or just one -- the panes/grid is one side, only, which is perfect for where I'm using it and what I had hoped for when I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Melhi

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to give friends a little privacy when they sleep over. Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Good addition to the bedroom
customer_reviews.text: I live in a fairly small apartment and don't have much storage space. After looking at different ways to cover up storage in my bedroom, these seemed like an attractive way to go and at about the same price as alternatives. They do a great job of concealing and are actually quite attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Randy W.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but fragile...
customer_reviews.text: The panel looks great but it is very fragile. The inserts are paper and if the screen tips over and one of the screen inserts tears, that's pretty much the end of the screen. Every night my grandson goes to bed and throws the decorative pillows on the floor, I hold my breath that the screen stands upright for a while. If you are looking for something sturdy, I would not recommend this product but if you just want a nice decorative touch to a room, this screen is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Schaffer

customer_reviews.title: it is quite nice and helps structure my studio apartment
customer_reviews.text: Had a lot of random fibers on it that took a while to clean. Had metal shavings clinging to it that were a tad sharp. After cleaning it and letting it air out (strong smell was present), it is quite nice and helps structure my studio apartment. It’s a bit cheap looking though. Mine is warped where the hinge is, so it looks like something for a student.
customer_reviews.author: Sath

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL WAY TO PARTITION ROOM
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and easy to move around. It seems to be of good quality even though the paper is super thin. I did poke my finger thru the paper when I was trying to get it out of the box. Really is a pretty room divider or a good thing to hide some stuff behind!!
customer_reviews.author: Kingsley

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP! You can see RIGHT THROUGH!
customer_reviews.text: Wood is cheap. I though the white part was going to be at least plastic or something similar, but it is cheap fabric. Also, not good at dividing. YOU can see right through the fold, but that is what you get for the price. I would recommend springing for something of higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: Precision

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my daughters room. I needed a way to separate her space from the rest of a open area. These are great. Love the style and the size is very generous. They are on the lighter side. May be easy to knock over by a child. However they serve their purpose and I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Elias

customer_reviews.title: Extremely pleased with the quality of this product.
customer_reviews.text: These screens are absolutely fabulous. I bought 2 of the four panel black screens. They arrived in perfect condition as they were very well packaged. I was so pleased when I opened them. The are very sturdy and very attractive to the eye. I had a 1/2 bath installed in one of our large bedrooms and needed the screens to make the privacy needed. I jam so very pleased with this purchase. Extremely fast delivery also. Superior product. I have to say that this is the very best item I have every purchased on the internet.
customer_reviews.author: Suzan Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Like many others here
customer_reviews.text: Like many others here...the box arrived damaged. The panel was in good shape for the most part with a small break in one of the cross bars. Fortunately it was a clean break and easily repaired with a bit of glue. Overall, the panels are nice. I have them in a spot where they will not be moved or touched on a regular basis so they should be fine. The piece is not very sturdy and a bit flimsy. But if it's not touched it should be okay. For the price on $36.00 it works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn A Peters

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Buy!
customer_reviews.text: We got this to provide some privacy from the neighbors during those hot summer nights when you want the windows wide open. We had a couple very warm nights recently and tried it out -- and it did exactly as we'd hoped. We're still amazed at how nice it is at this price. Much less expensive than any other screens we found, it's nice looking, light enough to move around easily, heavy enough to stand solidly -- we're so glad we found it! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy NiceTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what it says it is
customer_reviews.text: i'm very happy with this. My father is bed bound and his hospital bed is in our dining room. The family loves him there so he can interact with all of us. However, when he needs to be dressed he obviously doesn't get much privacy. Well with the screen divider he gets just that. ANd it looks very nice. You could put two of these together and create a whole separate room, but the four panel is really big enough to block the view. I was very pleasantly surprised as it looks just like the photo!
customer_reviews.author: Me in SoCal

customer_reviews.title: Does the job + affordable
customer_reviews.text: I'm using them to create privacy in my office. You really have to put you eyes uo against the slats to see through it. Really does the job well. Good price. Stays upright well. Packaged well. Didnt look like pokes would happen thought the white part.
customer_reviews.author: Colin Lieu

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and allows natural light to show through!
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy one of these to separate my bedroom from my office and I can’t tell you how thrilled I was when this arrived in the mail. It was exactly what I was looking for, it divides the room yet allows in enough natural light so no extra lighting is needed. And it looks nice too, which is a bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Used this as a room separator for my brother, seeing as we made the living room into his bedroom. Our bookcase concealed most of the room and this did the trick for the rest. It's really light and arrived undamaged. You can't see through it and it looks appealing as decoration.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: It looks great and we are very pleased
customer_reviews.text: This divider is well built and it arrived undamaged. Some reviews said it had a very bad chemical smell. We purchased it to hide a work area we have in the corner of our dining room and we were expecting a house full of guests the day after it arrived so a smell was a concern. When we unpacked it there was no smell at all that we could detect. It looks great and we are very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: R. Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I intended this product to achieve. Well built and high class. I will buy again if I have the need.
customer_reviews.author: LifeIsGrand

customer_reviews.title: Great product, very affordable
customer_reviews.text: Great product, very affordable.. Got two of the 4 panels, needed 6 panels but the price difference is insane. Open fully they can cover around 5.5ft, although the further you stretch them the less stable they become as the base forms a straight line. Using two I can easily cover 10ft across essentially cutting the entire room into another section. Very useful for things such as hiding presents for the kids, separating a work area, etc.. I would recommend these as they were cheap, shipped quick in easy packaging, and work great out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: cubes138

customer_reviews.title: Light Weight and look Super Nice at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to block off the laundry room in our basement. They work great, but maybe are a little light weight. I worry they may eventually rip. They've been downstairs with three teenage boys for a month now and are holding up well, though! Lol They look nice and really cleaned things up.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Packaging was damaged but the unit seemed fine.  Looks quite nice in an office.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly like the image/description said. Packaging could be a bit better since there was a large damaged area but luckily it missed damaging the screen completely. Looks good in my office to separate my meditation area from rest of the room.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: It is a beautiful scre6that allows me to divide a room to make ...
customer_reviews.text: The screen arrived well packaged. It is a beautiful scre6that allows me to divide a room to make it multi-purpose. The material is durable and the screen is well-made. I recommend it for those places where you need extra space for storage and don't want it exposed OR to add privacy to a room.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Kohler Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: The light weight is a PLUS because you can move them easily in minutes!  I wouldn't want them to be heavy!
customer_reviews.text: Made a whole divider wall in my basement with these. Separated the toddler section from the big kids' pool table area. They look amazing! I was lucky and mine all arrived in perfect condition. I would buy these again in a minute if I needed more. When they are up, they do not look cheap-y.
customer_reviews.author: Conways

customer_reviews.title: Great Sturdy and Nicely Made Partition!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a simple backdrop for video calls so I bought this. So nice and light and sturdy and pretty. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice partition. Great quality for price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice partition. Great quality for price. Frame is wood- surprisingly lightweight, but stable. Screen is translucent white paper, and provides decent privacy. Actually bought this to help shield computer area from sunlight glare (streaming through high windows in the morning.) Works perfectly, and looks beautiful in our living room. Will use this for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: D. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Good piece at a good price!
customer_reviews.text: Nice, neat looking and decently constructed for the price. Came well packaged for shipping, so it arrived in very good condition. Great room decoration or room separator. I would definitely buy another if I needed it.
customer_reviews.author: BF

customer_reviews.title: This is great. We use it as a room divider so ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great. We use it as a room divider so that the baby won't see us when she goes to sleep. She sleeps better, and so do we! However, if you want something that is sturdy, this isn't it. I have to re-position the folds so it won't fall over every once in a while, and one time it fell over and the wood split on the edge. It still works but doesn't look as nice. Good as a privacy shade.
customer_reviews.author: Locavore

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!! it came perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited when I got my pkg at the fedex store, I had very bad experiences before when I boughtvthis item from walmart and came broken and the box horribly teared . But with Amazon and this seller my item came Perfectly packed with the "fragil" sign in the fron and the box had one extra external layer to protect it. For the price I paid !!! Cheaper than anyone else I got such an excellent product bigguer(4 panels) and cheaper than all comoetitor. Thanks to fedex too. The divider looks so nice in my living room to hide my bf file cabinets. Buy it from this seller and amazon.
customer_reviews.author: happyfeetagain

customer_reviews.title: Just ok. Not great.
customer_reviews.text: It is okay. It looks ok. Not great. It blocks the sunlight off the window which is why I bought it in the first place. Quality is so so. The rice paper is ok. The wood part is of low quality. There are 2 places where the wood has chipped off. These 2 pics are of 2 different places.
customer_reviews.author: Deermom

customer_reviews.title: A perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT! I couldn't have hoped for better. It comes put together and all you need to do is unpack it and set it up. It's sturdy and looks well designed. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: DDK3447

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Screening Off Baby Crib Area
customer_reviews.text: After searching for days for best review, price, item, I chose this cherry colored one, and it arrived fast, perfectly packaged, and I didn't have to do a thing. It was ready to just go up, around my daughter's crib. It's super lightweight, yet is sturdy enough to trust as I walk around it all day. I'd say the price is perfect, and shouldn't be any higher. If I were to see it in a local store, I'd be comfortable paying $30-$40...so with shipping added...the price is just right. Great buy for my need.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Kat

customer_reviews.title: Pre assembled for your convenience
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to create a temporary wall for blind judging during cocktail competitions at our bar. It came pre assembled which was a time saving relief. Worked out perfectly and seems to be built sturdily.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: 4 Panel Shoji Screen
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I bought one of these, and we love it! Also, the box looked a bit beat up, and one panel had a tear. So, I called the company, and they informed me that they'd ship out a three panel for free immediately. I was very impressed with their promptness and concern about the matter. We've had it for a long time now, and have no complaints. They're pretty and are easy to manage. Although, be very careful when placing them very close to windows. If it's two close, the molding corners can puncture holes if someone bumps against it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Michelle

customer_reviews.title: It Works, But Quality is Sub Par
customer_reviews.text: When you buy a shoji screen to separate a room, you want it to look nice on either side of it. This only looks nice on one side as it only has the window bevels on one side, leaving the other looking like an off white sheet of paper. Not what I would have expected for $80. Sorely disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Flores

customer_reviews.title: Love the product but it did not survive shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Took a gamble on this guy and it did arrive damaged. Box was pierced during shipping and a few wood slats were crushed and some of the screen was torn. It is very pretty especially when backlit by a window so was definitely worth ordering replacement for me. You can kind of see through it when looking through the gaps between panes but it's not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Ts

customer_reviews.title: Five stars
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous, tall, and has a 0.5 inch gap between the panels when laid flat in a stand. The paper is a little transparent to allow light through. I put it against a wall and hung a white shower curtain behind it to make it appear more white and not copy the wall color behind it. Well worth the price and great decor. Panels also swing both ways unlike other room dividers making it even better.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Lee

customer_reviews.title: Good light Weight Screen
customer_reviews.text: Screen is as advertised and what I expected. This is a light weight screen with fabric covering. Covering is opaque but does allow some light through. hinges and construction appear to be good. For a stationary screen or occasionally moved screen, which is what i bought it for, this should work well. Shipped and arrived on schedule. No issues.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Worked as needed
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Ordered it because I had a friend coming over and only have couch so used it as room divider, I didnt think it would be big enough but it is perfect. Also you can see a bit through the cracks but it isnt bad... The wood frame is sturdy and the paper isn't cheap or really thin, Pretty good quality.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Great Divider
customer_reviews.text: These came in packaged really well. The divider itself is very light yet built well, it pretty much just sits on its stand(bought seperately) all day but the times we take it off its just as stable. The rice paper is fragile so you will have to treat it with care. All in all we’re really happy with this divider!
customer_reviews.author: M. Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy screens
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected. It looks nice but is very flimsy, and falls down easily!
customer_reviews.author: Ainahainagirl

customer_reviews.title: Great addition
customer_reviews.text: This room divider is sturdy and can be easily adjusted. Works well as intended and adds a bit of sophistication to the room.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice dividers to give privacy without blocking sunlight
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these dividers and they're great! I placed one in front of a sliding glass door and one in front of an office window. Both give privacy without blocking sunlight! I would definitely recommend! Pros: Looks nice; doesn't block sunlight. Cons: None
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: This was a great deal. I used it to block off a bedroom and bathroom from the living room when we had guests. It allowed the guests to go between the bed and bath without having to cover up. It worked well and seems to be of good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Here is my honest opinion

customer_reviews.title: Added a bit of room design by dividing!
customer_reviews.text: This divider looks great...on one side. I was hoping that the grid look would be present on both sides of the divider but the other side is just plain white paper. Looking past this, I was still very satisfied with the effect this divider gave my living room. It's a nice size, and much lighter than it appears. Not so light that you would fear it toppling over at the slightest bump, but light enough that it isn't a hassle to move around if you feel the frequent need to rearrange (as I often do). Great room divider, would buy more if I had the room/need.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel S.

product_meta.title: 4-Panel Folding Screen Black and White
product_meta.description: Size:4-PanelsTurn one entertainment area into two with this four-panel screen. On one side of the screen, make a study room with no distractions. On the other side, create an area to create a painting or sculpture. Or simply sit on opposite sides of the room and contemplate in silence. Constructed with black frame and designed with contrasting white panel screen in a block pattern. Material between the wood lattice- White non-woven fabric
feature_bullets: Material Content: 25% nitrocellulose call grads, 20% solvent type alkyd resins, 3% zine stearate, 15% ethyl acetate,20% butyl acetate, 1% antifoaming agent, 2% silica, 14% pigment
Material between the wood lattice: White non-woven fabric

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,466 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
